Summary: Pinkish light launches up into low hanging clouds.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Livingston
There were no other sightings in Livingston on or around June 14th 2009
divs: sighting detailsi was driving home from work at 10:10 pm. as i crested a hill, heading south in paradise valley, i saw (from 10 miles away) a pinkish\orange light launch from the ground straight up into the clouds. enough of the twilight was lingering that i could see it came from the approximate neighborhood of my house. the sighting lasted one second. it looked like someone setting off fireworks, only it was raining and it travelled much faster than a firework.
